repositories.label: AccessClinicalData@NIAID
repositories.abstract: Data sets from NIAID COVID-19 & other clinical trials for the basic and clinical research community

repositories.label: ClinEpiDB
repositories.abstract: Integrated data from high quality epidemiological (including clinical) studies optimized for re-use

repositories.label: Data Discovery Engine
repositories.abstract: Data registry that harvests metadata from CTSA Program hubs & other biomedical data providers

repositories.label: Dryad Digital Repository
repositories.abstract: An open data publishing platform that serves researchers from all domains and every field

repositories.label: Harvard Dataverse
repositories.abstract: Multidisciplinary open data repository with customizable collections of datasets (individual Dataverses)

repositories.label: HuBMAP
repositories.abstract: Integrates disparate, multi-dimensional and multi-scale datasets for interoperability, sharing, and reuse

repositories.label: Human Cell Atlas
repositories.abstract: Data repository focused on genomics and imaging data for individual cells from the human body

repositories.label: ImmPort
repositories.abstract: Scientific data generated by the diverse community of life science researchers supported by NIAID/DAIT

repositories.label: BD2K-LINCS DCIC
repositories.abstract: Data focused on how cells respond to various genetic and environmental stressors

repositories.label: Mendeley
repositories.abstract: Multidisciplinary research data repository with public and private sharing options

repositories.label: MicrobiomeDB
repositories.abstract: Systems biology platform for exploring data and metagenomic data from microbiome experiments

repositories.label: NCBI GEO
repositories.abstract: Repository of microarray, next-generation sequencing & other high-throughput functional genomic data

repositories.label: NCBI Sequence Read Archive
repositories.abstract: Largest public repository of high throughput sequencing data from all branches of life

repositories.label: Omics Discovery Index (OmicsDI)
repositories.abstract: Aggregates heterogeneous omics data (genomics, proteomics, transcriptomics & more) from multiple sources

repositories.label: Qiita
repositories.abstract: Open-source microbial study management platform for scientists to share multi-omics datasets as studies

repositories.label: ReframeDB
repositories.abstract: Screening data for 12,000 compounds to facilitate drug repurposing, especially to treat pathogens

repositories.label: VDJServer
repositories.abstract: A free, scalable resource with immune repertoire sequence data and rearrangements

repositories.label: VEuPathDB
repositories.abstract: Database of diverse, genome-scale research data for vectors, parasites, and fungi

repositories.label: Vivli
repositories.abstract: Global clinical research data sharing platform with anonymized individual participant-level data

repositories.label: Zenodo
repositories.abstract: An open, multidisciplinary repository that enables sharing of a variety of research outputs
